Title: Informs certain parties that resuming the use of their former surname is permitted by operation of law
Summary: Informs the parties in certain judgments or decrees that resuming the use of their former surname is permitted by operation of law.
LawCode: Amd ยง240-a, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to informing the parties in certain judgments or decrees that resuming the use of their former surname is permitted by operation of law
